gameplay.input.ai

Class AverageAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.input.ai.AI
      • gameplay.input.ai.AverageAI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandIssuer, java.io.Serializable

    public class AverageAI
extends AI
    AI implementation of the Medium AI as per requirement "medium intelligence enemies will move like low intelligence enemies but may change directions at an intersection with a 10% chance. Medium intelligence enemies shall also chase bomberman if bomberman comes within a 1 square radius."
    Author:
    YA
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public Command chdirAndChaseBomberman(java.lang.Boolean percentChance)
        This method encompasses the change direction method but it also makes the GameActor (enemy) an enemy
        Parameters:
        percentChance -
        Returns:
        up, down, right, left depending on what direction it was going before and depending on if bomberman is around

      • changeDirection

        public Command changeDirection(java.lang.Boolean percentChance)
        This method makes the GameActor change directions.
        Parameters:
        percentChance - the chance it changes directions per intersection
        Returns:
        up, down, right, left depending on the direction it was going before and the percentChance

        public Command upAndDown()

        public java.lang.Boolean isTenPercent()
